allowClear.description: Allows the input field to be cleared

error.description: Whether it is an error state. (Deprecated, removed in the next major version, replaced with status='error')
error.description_zh: 是否是错误状态。(废弃，下个大版本移除，使用 status='error' 替代)

:clearIcon.description: allowClear when configuring the icon for the Clear button.
:clearIcon.description_zh: allowClear 时配置清除按钮的图标。

autoSize.description: Whether to automatically adjust the height of the input box
autoSize.description_zh: 是否自动调整输入框的高度

:maxLength.description: the maximum length of the input box; If errorOnly is set to true, the error status will be displayed when the maxLength is exceeded, and the user is not restricted from entering.
:maxLength.description_zh: 输入框最大输入的长度；设置 errorOnly为 true 后，超过 maxLength 会展示 error 状态，并不限制用户输入。

:wrapperStyle.description: After the word count is enabled, a layer of div will be encased in the textarea tag, and wrapperStyle will be used to configure the style of this div.
:wrapperStyle.description_zh: 开启字数统计之后，会在 textarea 标签外包一层 div，wrapperStyle 用来配置这个 div 的样式。

events.name: onChange
events.description: Callback at the time of entry

events.name: onClear
events.description: Click the callback of the Clear button

events.name: onPressEnter
events.description: Push the Enter key to call back
